items.sentence: I suppose you want to ask me what I was doing yesterday.
I heard that a woman stabbed a man for eating her lunch.
I imagine that Tom and Mary will eventually get married.
I could be playing golf right now instead of doing this.
I could tell from your reaction that you were surprised.
I\'m one of the thirty people who were asked to do that.
It never occurred to me that Tom wouldn\'t like it here.
Let\'s see if we can work out our problems by ourselves.
Without Tom\'s help, I would\'ve been unable to do that.
Tom wasn\'t aware that Mary couldn\'t understand French.
